head.title: What is this site all about?

webpage.para: This site tries to provide useful information for GIMP developers. No matter whether you are into plug-in development or want to dive into the internals of the GIMP core, you should find your way from here.
If you're looking for the main GIMP website you should visit www.gimp.org.
Proceed to GIMPCon 2004 to learn more about this year's GIMP developers conference that was held in Kristiansand, Norway, on the 28th, 29th and 30th of June.
